full_text: UNITED 3R$50nP PINDIA LITT GREEN GREENERS THREE RUPEES FIFTY NAYERPAIS 20 Starting York NOTAR I, Mr. Chhotubhai Girjashanker Bhatt, Principal, Shri Narayan Vidyalaya, Baroda, India residing at Bajwada, Dholikui, NOTARIAL Baroda, born on 5th day of February One Thousand Nine hundred Seven (5-2-1907) at Baroda in India, hereby affirm on oath that Dr. Manibhai S. Patel has been intimately known to me as a former colleague and later as a friend since 1932, that his AR first wife Mrs. Kamalaben M. Patel died on April 28, 1942 and that he got married to his present wife, Mrs. Champaben M.Patel, on AR December 14, 1942. I make this statement from my personal experience based on the fact that I attended the funeral and cremation of Mrs. Kamalaben M. Patel and the wedding ceremony BARODA HEALTH Dr. I Manibhai S. Patel to Mrs. Champaben M. Patel. BROACH also personally know and solemnly effirm that the said KAMA DE. Manibhai S. Patel has a son named Parimal by his first wife, PARMENTAL Keymon DISTRICTS OF when, and another son named Anupam and a daughter named GUJARAT STATE Aparila by his present wife, Champaben. Chholibhei G Bhatt NOTARY (CHROTUSHAI G. BHATT) Subscribed and sworn (officered) before this 29th day of December, A.D. 1971 at BARODA, India. Solemnly affirmed before me by this Elhnotushai gir syarhankas Bhatt. whom personally 29-12-76 know. Dt who sucing NOTARY 29-12-71
